file_content.text: Stop right there. This is an Imperial control station.
I'm authorized to use deadly force protecting Cartel-Imperial interests. State your business or get out.
Sith don't answer to captains. I'm compiling a report on this operation, and you'd better have answers for me.
An inspection. [Show Sith ID]
But we weren't expecting... m--my apologies!
You dare impede a Sith in her duties? I should take your head for this!
Silence, worm! [Show Sith ID]
You dare impede a Sith in his duties? I should cut you down where you stand!
Silence, worm! [Show Sith ID]
An inspection? I'm--please forgive me. I meant no disrespect!
P--productivity is down but--we'll drive the workers harder! Double our quota next month!
The Emperor himself requested this inspection. He will be most displeased. As am I.
The Emperor will hear of this.
The... the Emperor? W--we'll do better! I swear it!
The wealth of the Empire is at stake! Incompetence will be punished!
Worthless fool.
I--I'll see to it personally that matters improve!
Enough! Go and polish your boots or... whatever it is you do. I'll deal with you later.
Just leave.
You're a disgrace to the Empire. Your mere presence offends me. Leave!
Get out of my sight!
Y--yes, my lord. At once.
Perhaps your officers would be more motivated if they saw what happens when the Sith are displeased.
I'll make an example of you.
Among the Sith, there's only one penalty for failure.
Now you die. [Kill him]
B--but I've served the Empire loyally! You wouldn't--I mean, one mistake surely can't--
The order's been given, sir.
Arrgh!
I know better than to question a Sith. Please, excuse us. We should file the standard report.
My "business" is destroying people like you.
I'm here to kill you.
Damned Republic spies!
